This luxury hotel, a strikingly beautiful palatial building, embodies an old-world charm along with visible impressions of contemporary luxury. For an intimate and exceptional dining experience, we serve a variety of Indian, Mughlai, Chinese and Continental cuisines in our dining rooms that overlook lush green landscapes and winding valleys. Not to disappoint our business and corporate guests, the hotel provides exclusive services to host business conferences and meetings in our spacious conference halls, the best conference halls in Nainital.

Away from the Hustle and bustle, yet located in the heart of the town, The Manu Maharani Hotel and Spa, Nainital is only a short walk from the Mall at Nainital.
